staxel.village.character.dialogue.Cecile: I'm doing my best not to accidentally blow up anything around the house.
So far, it's only been my toaster!
What if I told you I could make sure we wake up on time?
What if I told you I could install a mechanism in your bed that would guarantee you wake up at exactly the right time?
Just so you know, I'm completely over trying to bring creatures to life.
Our sink just isn't quite good enough...
I think I could probably increase the tap pressure a little bit more...
I thought you might like to know that I built an automated farming robot that does everything for you!
It...well it broke pretty quickly though.
Not sure how long it'll take to get it working again...
